1.text: Stick a skewer through the large Styrofoam ball to make a hole.

2.text: Spin the skewer around to make the hole bigger.

3.text: Slide the boba straw through the hole with the skewer inside.

4.text: Poke 8 popsicle sticks into the ball to make the spokes.

5.text: Add a smaller ball to the end of each popsicle stick for the gondolas.

6.text: Insert 2 bamboo skewers into the top corners of the base.

7.text: Bend the skewers together to make an X shape.

8.text: Glue the skewers together where they cross.

9.text: Make another X at the bottom of the support base.

10.text: Rest the center pole of the Ferris wheel on the supports.

11.text: Decorate your Ferris wheel with markers.

12.text: Try different ways to make your Ferris wheel spin.

13.text: Observe how your Ferris wheel moves and stops.

14.text: Compare your model to the way a real Ferris wheel works.
